law.text: Unless the organic rules provide for greater rights, if a member is dissociated because of death or is expelled by reason of being adjudged incompetent, the memberâ€™s personal representative or other legal representative may exercise the rights of a transferee of the memberâ€™s financial rights and, for purposes of settling the estate of a deceased member, may exercise the informational rights of a current member to obtain information under KRS 272A.5-040.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 87, effective July 12, 2012.
